revised_title: Dynamo Action of Fluid Motions with Two-Dimensional Periodicity
tldr: The author investigates the dynamo action of fluid motions with two-dimensional periodicity, focusing on the magnetic field generation and its relationship with the resistivity of the fluid. The study shows that there is dynamo action for almost all resistivities, except for a discrete set with no non-zero point of accumulation. The findings have implications for understanding the generation of Earth's magnetic field and the behavior of fluids in geophysical systems.
